scripts.build: npm run build:react && npm run build:vite
scripts.build:react: node ./scripts/build.mjs && tsc src/index.ts --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir dist --skipLibCheck --lib ES2015,DOM --target ES2015 --moduleResolution bundler --jsx react
scripts.build:vite: node ./scripts/build-vite.mjs && tsc src/vite/index.ts --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir dist/vite --skipLibCheck --lib ES2015,DOM --target ES2020 --module esnext --moduleResolution node  --allowSyntheticDefaultImports
